title: 3 and Out - Not Buying Big Ben, Teddy Too Safe, Mac Momentum, Bad Urban Vibes, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Not Buying Big Ben, Teddy Too Safe, Mac Momentum, Bad Urban Vibes, Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John discusses why he's not sold on Ben Roethlisberger's health because of an impressive preseason, why the Broncos played it too safe by naming Teddy Bridgewater the starter, why Belichick should move on from Cam in favor of rookie Mac Jones, and why he has major questions about Urban Meyer's college type approach to his first NFL training camp. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
